item.title: Apache Nifi
item.description: Chapter 2 Apache NiFi NiFi Homepage Github Repo Issues graph LR; A[ListenTCP] --|success| B(Process Events) B --|queue| C{QueryResults} C --|One| D[InvokeHTTP] C --|Two| E[PutFile] NiFi is fairly resilient but if you skimp on compute cores or disk IO you will suffer with long queues and high latency.
